GSD.description:
bfq: fix use-after-free in bfq_dispatch_request

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 74e610b5ee0d95e751280567100509eb11517efa. For more details please see the references link.
